Translations.Text: tara eke an'yera kache ki bisaye jijnasabada karache
mahasambadatira bisaye
ye bisaye tara matanaikya karache
kakhano na [1], tara acire'i janate parabe
tarapara bali kakhano na, tara acire'i janate parabe
Amara ki karini yaminake sayya
ara parbatasamuhake pereka
ara amara srsti karechi tomaderake joraya joraya
ara tomadera ghumake karechi bisraama
ara karechi ratake abarana
ara karechi dinake jibika aharanera samaya
ara amara nirmana karechi tomadera upare sudrrha sata akasa
ara amara srsti karechi projjbala dipa
Ara amara barsana karechi meghamala hate pracura bari
yate ta dbara amara utpanna kari sasya, udbhida
o ghana sannibista udyana
Niscaya nirdharita ache bicara dina
sedina singaya phumka deya habe takhana tomara dale dale asabe
ara akasa unmukta kara habe, phale ta habe bahu dbarabisista
Ara calamana kara habe parbatasamuhake, phale segulo haye yabe maricika
niscaya jahannama ot pete apeksamana
simalanghanakaridera jan'ya pratyabartanasthala
Sekhane tara yuga yuga dhare abasthana karabe
Sekhane tara asbadana karabe na sitalata, na kono paniya
phutanta pani o pumja chara
Eta'i upayukta pratiphala
Niscaya tara kakhano hisebera asa karata na
ara tara amadera nidarsanabalite kathorabhabe mithyaropa karechila
Ara sabakichu'i amara sanraksana karechi likhitabhabe
Atahpara tomara asbada grahana kara, amara to tomadera sasti'i sudhu brd'dhi karaba
Niscaya muttakidera jan'ya ache saphalya
udyanasamuha, angurasamuha
ara samabayaska [1] udbhinna yaubana taruni
ebam paripurna panipatra
Sekhane tara sunabe na kono asara o mithya bakya
apanara rabera paksa theke puraskara, yathocita danasbarupa
yini asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, dayamaya; tamra kache abedana-nibedanera sakti tadera thakabe na
Sedina ruh o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe damrabe [1]; sedina ke'u katha balabe na, tabe ‘rahamana’ yake anumati debena se chara ebam se sathika katha balabe
E dinati satya; ata'eba, yara icche se tara rabera nikata asraya grahana karuka
Niscaya amara tomaderake asanna sasti samparke satarka karalama; yedina manusa tara krtakarma dekhate pabe ebam kaphira balabe, ‘haya! Ami yadi mati hatama [1]!’
Sapatha [1] nirmamabhabe utpatanakaridera
ara mrdubhabe bandhanamuktakaridera
ara tibra gatite santaranakaridera
ara drutabege agrasaramanadera
atahpara saba kaja nirbahakaridera
Sedina prakampitakari prakampita karabe
take anusarana karabe parabarti kampanakari
aneka hrdaya sedina santrasta habe
tadera drstisamuha bhiti-bihbalataya nata habe
Tara bale, ‘amara ki agera abasthaya phire yaba'i
curnabicurna asthite parinata ha'oyara para'o?’
Tara bale, ‘ta'i yadi haya tabe to eta eka sarbanasa pratyabartana.’
E to sudhu eka bikata a'oyaja
takhana'i mayadane [1] tadera abirbhaba habe
Apanara kache musara brttanta paumcheche ki
Yakhana tamra raba pabitra upatyaka ‘tu'oya’ya tamke deke balechilena
‘phira‘a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche,’
atahpara baluna, ‘tomara ki agraha ache ye, tumi pabitra ha'o—
‘ara ami tomake tomara rabera dike pathapradarsana kari, yate tumi tamke bhaya kara?’
Atahpara tini take mahanidarsana dekhalena
Kintu se mithyaropa karala ebam abadhya hala
Tarapara se pichane phire pratibidhane sacesta hala
Atahpara se sakalake samabeta kare ghosana dila
atahpara balala, ‘ami'i tomadera sarbocca raba.’
Atahpara allah take akherate o duniyaya kathina sastite pakara'o karalena
Niscaya ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya to ete siksa rayeche
Tomaderake [1] srsti kara kathina, na asamana srsti? Tini'i ta nirmana karechena
tini era chadake su'ucca karechena o subin'yasta karechena
Ara tini era ratake karechena andhakaracchanna ebam prakasa karechena era suryaloka
ara yaminake era para bistrta karechena
Tini ta theke bera karechena tara pani o trnabhumi
ara parbatake tini drrhabhabe prothita karechena
esaba tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantugulora bhogera jan'ya
Atahpara yakhana mahasankata upasthita habe
manusa ya kareche ta se sedina smarana karabe
ara prakasa kara habe jahannama darsakadera jan'ya
sutaram ye simalanghana kare
ebam duniyara jibanake agraadhikara deya
Jahannama'i habe tara abasa
Ara ye tara rabera abasthanake [1] bhaya kare ebam kuprabrtti hate nijake birata rakhe
jannata'i habe tara abasa
Tara apanake jijnesa kare, ‘kiyamata samparke, ta kakhana ghatabe?’
Ta alocanara ki jnana apanara ache
era parama jnana apanara rabera'i kache
ye etara bhaya rakhe apani sudhu tara satarkakari
Yedina tara ta dekhate pabe sedina tadera mane habe yena tara duniyaya matra eka sandhya athaba eka prabhata abasthana kareche
Tini bhrakuncita karalena ebam mukha phiriye nilena
karana tamra kache andha lokati asala
Ara kise apanake janabe ye, --- se hayata parisud'dha hata
athaba upadesa grahana karata, phale se upadesa tara upakare asata
Ara ye paroya kare na
apani tara prati manoyoga diyechena
Athaca se nije parisud'dha na hale apanara kono dayitba ne'i
aparadike ye apanara kache chute elo
ara se sasankacitta
apani tara theke udasina halena
kakhano naya, eta to upadesa bani
kaje'i ye icche karabe se eta smarana rakhabe
eta ache maryada sampanna lipisamuhe
ya unnata, pabitra
lekhaka ba dutadera hate
(Yara) mahasam'manita o nekakara
Manusa dhbansa hoka! Se kata akrtajna
tini take kona bastu theke srsti karechena
sukrabindu theke, tini take srsti karena, pare tara parimita bikasa sadhana karena
tarapara tara jan'ya patha sahaja kare dena
erapara tara mrtyu ghatana ebam take kabarastha karena
Erapara yakhana icche tini take punarjibita karabena
Kakhano naya, tini take ya adesa karechena, se ekhano ta purna kareni
Atahpara manusa yena tara khadyera prati laksya kare
niscaya amara pracura bari barsana kari
tarapara amara yaminake yathayathabhabe bidirna kari
atahpara tate amara utpanna kari sasya
angura, saka-sabji
yayatuna, khejuragacha
aneka gachabisista udyana
phala ebam gabadi khadya
egulo tomadera o tomadera catuspada jantudera bhogera jan'ya
Atahpara yakhana tiksna a'oyaja asabe
sedina manusa paliye yabe tara bha'iyera kacha theke
ebam tara mata, tara pita
tara patni o tara santana theke
sedina tadera pratyekera habe emana gurutara abastha ya take sampurnarupe byasta rakhabe
Aneka cehara sedina habe ujjbala
sahasya o praphulla
ara aneka cehara sedina habe dhulidhusara
Seguloke acchanna karabe kalima
Era'i kaphira o papacari
Suryake yakhana nisprabha kara habe
ara yakhana naksatraraji khase parabe
ara parbatasamuhake yakhana calamana kara habe
ara yakhana purnagarbha madi uta upeksita habe
ara yakhana ban'ya pasugulo ekatra kara habe
ara yakhana sagarake agni-uttala kara habe
ara yakhana atmaguloke samagotriyadera sathe miliye deya habe
ara yakhana jibanta samadhistha kan'yake [1] jijnesa kara habe
ki aparadhe take hatya kara hayechila
ara yakhana amalanamagulo unmocita kara habe
ara yakhana asamanera abarana apasarita kara habe
ara yakhana jahannamake bhisanabhabe prajjbalita kara habe
ara yakhana jannata nikatabarti kara habe
takhana pratyeka byakti'i janabe se ki upasthita kareche
Sutaram ami sapatha karachi pascadapasaranakari naksatrera
ya calamana, apasryamana
sapatha ratera yakhana ta sesa haya
sapatha prabhatera yakhana tara abirbhaba haya
niscaya'i e kura'ana sam'manita rasulera anita bani
ye samarthyasali, arasera malikera kache maryada sampanna
se man'ya sekhane, bisbasabhajana
Ara tomadera sathi unmada nana
tini to take spasta digante dekhechena
tini gayebi bisaya samparke krpana naya
Ara eta kono abhisapta sayatanera bakya naya
Kaje'i tomara kothaya yaccha
e to sudhu srstikulera jan'ya upadesa
tomadera madhye ye sarala pathe calate caya, tara jan'ya
Ara tomara icche karate para na, yadi na srstikulera raba allah icche karena
Yakhana asamana bidirna habe
ara yakhana naksatramandali biksiptabhabe jhare parabe
ara yakhana sagaragulo bisphorita kara habe
ara yakhana kabarasamuha unmocita habe
takhana pratyeke janabe, se ki age pathiyeche o ki pichane rekhe giyeche
He manusa! Kise tomake tomara mahana raba samparke bibhraanta karala
Yini tomake srsti karechena, atahpara tomake suthama karechena ebam susamanjasya karechena
ye akrtite ceyechena, tini tomake gathana karechena
Kakhano naya, tomara to pratidana dibase mithyaropa kare thaka
ara niscaya niyojita achena tomadera upara sanraksakadala
sam'manita lekhakabrnda
tara jane tomara ya kara
Punyabanera to thakabe parama sbacchandyo
ara papacarira to thakabe jahanname
tara pratidana dibase tate dagdha habe
ara tara sekhana theke antarhita hate parabe na
Ara kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
tarapara bali, kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
sedina ke'u kara'o jan'ya kichu karara malika habe na; ara sedina saba bisayera kartrtba habe allahara
Durbhoga tadera jan'ya yara mape kama deya
yara lokadera kacha theke mepe neyara samaya purnamatraya grahana kare
ara yakhana taderake mepe deya athaba ojana kare deya, takhana kama deya
Tara ki bisbasa kare na ye, tara punaruthita habe
mahadine
yedina damrabe samasta manusa srstikulera rabera samane
kakhano na, papacaridera amalanama to sijjine [1] ache
Ara kise apanake janabe ‘sijjina’ ki
cihnita amalanama
Sedina durbhoga habe mithyaropakaridera
yara pratidana dibase mithyaropa kare
ara sudhu pratyeka papistha simalanghanakari'i ete mithyaropa kare
yakhana tara kache amadera ayatasamuha tela'oyata kara haya takhana se bale, (e to) ‘purbabartidera upakatha.’
Kakhano naya; baram tara ya arjana kareche ta-i tadera hrdaye jan dhariyeche
Kakhano naya; niscaya sedina tara tadera raba hate antarita thakabe
tarapara niscaya tara jahanname dagdha habe
tarapara bala habe, ‘eta'i ta yate tomara mithyaropa karate.’
Kakhano naya, niscaya punyabanadera amalanama ‘illiya'iyyine’
Ara kise apanake janabe ‘illiyyina’ ki
cihnita amalanama
(Allahara) sannidhyapraptara'i ta abalokana kare
Niscaya punyabanagana thakabe parama sbacchandye
susajjita asane base tara dekhate thakabe
Apani tadera mukhamandale sbacchandyera dipti dekhate pabena
taderake mohara kara bisud'dha paniya hate pana karana habe
yara mohara habe misakera [1], ara e bisaye pratiyogira pratiyogita karuka
Ara tara misrana habe tasnimera
eta eka prasrabana, ya theke sannidhyapraptara pana kare
Niscaya yara aparadha kareche tara muminaderake upahasa karata
ara yakhana tara muminadera kacha diye yeta takhana tara cokha tipe bidrarupa karata
Ara yakhana tadera apanajanera kache phire asata takhana tara phirata utphulla haye
ara yakhana muminaderake dekhata takhana balata, ‘niscaya era pathabhrasta [1].’
Athaca taderake muminadera tattbabadhayaka kare pathano hayani
Ata'eba aja muminagana upahasa karabe kaphiraderake
susajjita asane base tara dekhate thakabe
Kaphirara tadera krtakarmera phala pela to
yakhana akasa bidirna habe
ara tara rabera adesa palana karabe ebam eta'i tara karaniya
Ara yakhana yaminake samprasarita kara habe
Ara yamina tara abhyantare ya ache ta ba'ire niksepa karabe o sun'yagarbha habe
ebam tara rabera adesa palana karabe eta'i tara karaniya
He manusa! Tumi tomara rabera kache paucha paryanta kathora parisrama karate habe, atahpara tumi tamra saksata labha karabe
Atahpara yake tara ‘amalanama tara dana hate deya habe
tara hiseba-nikesa sahaje'i neya habe
ebam se tara sbajanadera kache [1] praphullacitte phire yabe
ara yake tara ‘amalanama tara pithera pichanadika theke deya habe
se abasya'i tara dhbansa dakabe
ebam jbalanta agune dagdha habe
niscaya se tara sbajanadera madhye anande chila
Se to bhabate ye, se kakhane'i phire yabe na
hyam, [1] niscaya tara raba tara upara samyaka drsti danakari
Atahpara ami sapatha karachi [1] pascima akasera
ara sapatha ratera ebam ta ya kichura samabesa ghataya tara
ebam sapatha camdera, yakhana ta purna haya
abasya'i tomara eka stara theke an'ya stare arohana karabe
Atahpara tadera ki hala ye, tara imana ane na
ara yakhana tadera kache kura'ana patha kara haya takhana tara sajda kare na
baram kaphirara mithyaropa kare
Ara tara ya posana kare allah ta sabisesa abagata
Kaje'i apani taderake yantranadayaka sastira sambada dina
kintu yara imana ane o satkaja kare tadera jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna puraskara
Sapatha burujabisista [1] asamanera
ara pratisruta dinera
ebam drasta o drstera
abhisapta hayechila [1] kundera adhipatira
ye kunde chila indhanapurna aguna
yakhana tara era pase upabista chila
ebam tara muminadera sathe ya karachila ta pratyaksa karachila
Ara tara taderake niryatana karechila sudhu e karane ye, tara imana enechila parakramasali o prasansara yogya allahara upara
asamanamuha o yaminera sarbamaya kartrtba yamra; ara allah sabakichura pratyaksadarsi
Niscaya yara mumina nara-narike bipadapanna kareche [1] tarapara ta'oba kareni [2] tadera jan'ya ache jahannamera sasti, ara tadera jan'ya ache dahana yantrana
Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche jannata, yara padadese nadi prabahita; eta'i mahasaphalya
Niscaya apanara rabera pakara'o bara'i kathina
Tini'i astitba dana karena o punarabartana ghatana
ebam tini ksamasila, atisnehamaya
arasera adhikari o sam'manita
Tini ya icche ta-i karena
Apanara kache ki paumcheche sain'yabahinira brttanta
phira‘a'una o samudera
tabu kaphirara mithyaropa karaya rata
Ara allah sabadika theke taderake paribestana kare rayechena
Bastuta eta sam'manita kura'ana
sanraksita phalake lipibad'dha
Sapatha asamanera ebam rate ya abirbhuta haya tara
ara kise apanake janabe ‘rate ya abirbhuta haya’ ta ki
ujjbala naksatra
Pratyeka jibera upara'i tattbabadhayaka rayeche
Ata'eba, manusa yena cinta kare dekhe take ki theke srsti kara hayeche
take srsti kara hayeche sabege sthalita pani hate
eta nirgata haya merudanda o panjarasthira madhya theke
Niscaya tini take phiriye anate saksama
Yedina gopana bisaya pariksita habe
sedina tara kono samarthya thakabe na ebam sahayyakari'o naya
Sapatha asamanera, ya dharana kare brsti
ebam sapatha yaminera, ya bidirna haya
niscaya ala-kura'ana mimansakari bani
Ebam eta nirarthaka naya
Tara bhisana sarayantra kare
ebam ami'o bhisana kausala kari
Ata'eba, kaphiraderake abakasa dina; taderake abakasa dina kichu kalera jan'ya
Apani apanara sumahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna
yini [1] srsti karena [2] atahpara suthama karena
Ara yini nirdharana karena [1] atahpara pathanirdesa karena
ara yini trnadi utpanna karena
pare ta dhusara abarjanaya parinata karena
Sighra'i amara apanake patha karaba, phale apani bhulabena na
allah ya icche karena ta chara [1]. Niscaya tini janena ya prakasya o ya gopaniya
Ara amara apanara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha
Atahpara upadesa yadi phalaprasu haya tabe upadesa dina
ye bhaya kare se'i upadesa grahana karabe
Ara ta upeksa karabe ye nitanta hatabhagya
ye bhayabaha agune dagdha habe
tarapara sekhane se marabe'o na bamcabe'o na
Abasya'i saphalya labha karabe ye parisud'dha haya
Ebam tara rabera nama smarana kare o salata kayema kare
Kintu tomara duniyara jibanake pradhan'ya da'o
athaca akhirata'i utkrsta [1] o sthayi
Niscaya eta ache purbabarti sahiphasamuhe
ibrahima o musara sahiphasamuhe
Apanara kache ki acchannakarira (kiyamatera) sambada eseche
sedina aneka cehara habe abanata
klista, klanta
tara prabesa karabe jbalanta agune
taderake atyanta usna prasrabana theke pana karano habe
tadera jan'ya khadya thakabe na kamtayukta gulma chara
ya taderake pusta karabe na ebam tadera ksudha nibrtta karabe na
Aneka mukhamandala sedina habe anandojjbala
nijedera kajera saphalye paritrpta
su'ucca jannate
sekhane tara asara bakya sunabe na
sekhane thakabe bahamana prasrabana
sekhane thakabe unnata [1] sayyasamuha
ara prastuta thakabe panapatra
sari sari upadhana
ebam bichana galica
tabe ki tara takiye dekhe na utera dike, kibhabe ta srsti kara hayeche
ebam asamanera dike, kibhabe ta urdhbe sthapana kara hayeche
ebam parbatamalara dike, kibhabe ta pratisthita kara hayeche
ebam bhutalera dike, kibhabe ta bistrta kara hayeche
ata'eba apani upadesa dina; apani to kebala ekajana upadesa data
apani tadera upara sakti prayogakari nana
Tabe ke'u mukha phiriye nile o kuphari karale
allah taderake debena mahasasti
Niscaya tadera phire asa amadera'i kache
tarapara tadera hiseba-nikesa amadera'i kaja
Sapatha phajarera
sapatha dasa ratera
sapatha jora o bejorera
sapatha ratera yakhana ta gata haye thake –[1]—
niscaya'i era madhye sapatha rayeche bodhasampanna byaktira jan'ya
Apani dekhenani apanara raba ki (acarana) karechilena ‘ada bansera
irama gotrera prati [1]--- yara adhikari chila su'ucca prasadera
yara samatulya kono dese srsti kara hayani
Ebam samudera prati?- Yara upatyakaya [1] pathara kete ghara nirmana karechila
ebam kilaka'oyala phira‘a'unera prati
yara dese simalanghana karechila
atahpara sekhane asanti brd'dhi karechila
Phale apanara raba tadera upara sastira kasaghata hanalena
Niscaya apanara raba satarka drsti rakhena
Manusa to erupa ye, tara raba yakhana take pariksa karena sam'mana o anugraha dana kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake sam'manita karechena [1].’
Ara yakhana take pariksa karena tara riyka sankucita kare, takhana se bale, ‘amara raba amake hina karechena.’
Kakhano naya [1]. Baram [2] tomara iyatimake sam'mana kara na
ebam tomara misakinake khadyadane parasparake utsahita kara na
ara tomara uttaradhikarera sampada sampurnarupe kheye phela
ara tomara dhana-sampada khuba'i bhalabasa
kakhano naya [1]. Yakhana yaminake curna- bicurna kara habe
ara yakhana apanara raba agamana karabena o saribad'dhabhabe pherestagana'o
ara sedina jahannamake ana habe [1], sedina manusa smarana karabe, takhana e smarana tara ki kaje asabe
se balabe, ‘haya! Amara e jibanera jan'ya ami yadi kichu agrima pathatama?”
Sedina tamra sastira mata sasti ke'u dite parabe na
ebam tamra bamdhara mata bamdhate ke'u parabe na
He prasanta atma
tumi tomara rabera kache phire asa santusta o santosabhajana haye
atahpara amara bandadera antarbhukta ha'o
ara amara jannate prabesa kara
Ami [1] sapatha karachi e nagarera
ara apani e nagarera adhibasi
sapatha janmadatara o ya se janma diyeche
Nihsandehe amara manusake srsti karechi kasta-klesera madhye
Se ki mane kare ye, kakhano tara upara ke'u ksamatabana habe na
se bale, ‘ami pracura artha nihsesa karechi [1].’
Se ki mane kare ye, take ke'u dekheni
amara ki tara jan'ya srsti karini ducokha
Ara jihba o du'i thomta
ara amara take dekhiyechi [1] du’ti patha
Tabe se to bandhura giripathe [1] prabesa kareni
Ara kise apanake janabe--- bandhura giripatha ki
eta hacche: Dasamukti
athaba durbhiksera dine khadyadana [1]—
iyatima atmiyake
athaba daridra-nispesita nihsbake
tadupari se tadera antarbhukta haye yaya yara imana eneche ebam parasparake upadesa diyeche dhairya dharanera, ara paraspara upadesa diyeche daya anugrahera
tara'i saubhagyasali
Ara yara amadera ayatasamuhe kuphari kareche, tara'i hatabhagya
Tara paribestita habe abarud'dha agune
Sapatha suryera ebam tara kiranera
sapatha camdera, yakhana ta suryera para abirbhuta haya
sapatha dinera, yakhana se suryake prakasa kare
sapatha ratera, yakhana se suryake acchadita kare
sapatha asamanera ebam yini ta nirmana karechena tamra
sapatha jaminera ebam yini ta bistrta karechena tamra
sapatha naphsera [1] ebam yini ta subin'yasta karechena tamra
tarapara take tara satkajera ebam tara asat-kajera jnana dana karechena [1] –
se-i saphalakama hayeche, ye nijeke pabitra kareche
Ara se-i byartha hayeche, ye nijeke kalusita kareche
Samuda sampradaya abadhyatabasata [1] mithyaropa karechila
Tadera madhye ye sarbadhika hatabhagya, se yakhana tatpara haye uthala
takhana allahara rasula taderake balalena, ‘allahara ustri o take pani pana karanora bisaye sabadhana ha'o [1].’
Kintu tara tara prati mithyaropa karala ebam ustrike jaba'i karala [1]. Phale tadera papera jan'ya tadera raba taderake samule dhbansa kare ekakara kare dilena
Ara tini era parinamake bhaya karena na
Sapatha ratera, yakhana se acchanna kare
sapatha dinera, yakhana ta udbhasita haya
sapatha tamra, yini nara o nari srsti karechena
Niscaya tomadera karmapracesta bibhinna prakrtira
Kaje'i [1] ke'u dana karale, taka'oya abalambana karale
ebam ya uttama ta satya bale grahana karale
amara tara jan'ya sugama kare deba sahaja patha
Ara [1] ke'u karpanya karale ebam nijake amukhapeksi mane karale
ara ya uttama tate mithyaropa karale
tara jan'ya amara sugama kare deba kathora patha
Ara tara sampada tara kono kaje asabe na, yakhana se dhbansa habe
Niscaya amadera kaja sudhu pathanirdesa kara
ara amara'i to malika akheratera o prathamatira (duniyara)
Atahpara ami tomaderake lelihana aguna [1] samparke satarka kare diyechi
Tate prabesa karabe se-i, ye nitanta hatabhagya
ye mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya
Ara ta theke dure rakha habe parama muttakike
ye sbiya sampada dana kare atasud'dhira jan'ya
ebam tara prati kara'o emana kono anugraha ne'i yara pratidana dite habe
sudhu tara mahana rabera sastustira pratyasaya
ara acire'i se sastusta habe
Sapatha purbahnera
sapatha ratera yakhana ta haya nijhuma [1] –
apanara raba apanake parityaga karena ni [1] ebam sakrata'o karena ni
Ara abasya'i apanara jan'ya parabarti samaya purbabati samayera ceye sreya
Ara acire'i apanara raba apanake anugraha dana karabena, phale apani santusta habena
Tini ki apanake iyatima abasthaya pana ni? Atahpara tini asraya diyechena
ara tini apanake pelena patha samparke anabahita, atahpara tini pathera nirdesa dilena
Ara tini apanake pelena nihsba abasthaya, atahpara abhaba mukta karalena
Kaje'i apani iyatimera prati kathora habena na
Ara prarthike bhartsana karabena na
Ara apani apanara rabera anugrahera katha janiye dina
Amara ki apanara baksa apanara kalyane prasasta kare de'ini
Ara amara apasarana karechi apanara bhara
ya apanara pitha bhenge dicchila
Ara amara apanara (maryada brd'dhira) jan'ya apanara smaranake samunnata karechi
Sutaram kastera sathe'i to sbasti ache
niscaya kastera sathe'i sbasti ache
Ata'eba apani yakhana'i abasara pana takhana'i kathora ibadate rata hona
ara apanara rabera prati gabhira manoyogi hona
Sapatha ‘tina’ o ‘yayatuna” [1] – era
sapatha ‘ture sinina’ [1]-era
sapatha e'i nirapada nagarira
abasya'i amara srsti karechi manusake sundaratama gathane
tarapara amara take hinatagrastadera hinatame parinata kari –
kintu taderake naya yara imana eneche ebam satkarma kareche; edera jan'ya to ache nirabacchinna puraskara
Kaje'i (he manusa!) Erapara kise tomake karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi kare
allah ki bicarakadera madhye sarbasrestha bicaraka nana
paruna apanara rabera name, yini srsti karechena [1] –
srsti karechena manusake ‘alaka’ hate
Paruna, ara apanara raba mahamahimanbita
yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena [1] –
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na
Bastabe'i [1], manusa simalanghana'i kare thake
karana se nijake amukhapeksi mane kare
Niscaya apanara rabera kache'i phire ya'oya
Amake jana'o (ebam ascarya ha'o) tara samparke, ye badha deya
eka bandake [1]- yakhana tini salata adaya karena
Amake bala! Yadi tini hidayatera upara thakena
athaba takoyara nirdesa dena; (tarapara'o se kibhabe badha deya)
amake bala! Yadi se (nisedhakari) mithyaropa kare ebam mukha phiriye neya
se ki jane na ye, niscaya allah dekhena
kakhano naya, se yadi birata na haya tabe amara take abasya'i hemcare niye yaba, mathara samanera culera guccha dhare
mithyacari, papistha sam'mukha-culera-guccha
Ata'eba se tara parisadake deke anuka
sighra'i amara deke anaba yabaniyaderake
Kakhano naya! Apani tara anusarana karabena na. Ara apani sajda karuna ebam nikatabarti hona
Niscaya amara kura'ana nayila karechi [1] ‘la'ilatula kadare’
ara apanake kise janabe ‘la'ilatula-kadara’ ki
‘la'ilatula-kadara’ hajara masera ceye srestha
Se rate phiristagana o ruh nayila haya [1] tadera rabera anumatikrame sakala sid'dhanta [2] niye
Santimaya [1] se rata, phajarera abirbhaba paryanta
Ahale kitabadera madhye yara kuphari kareche ebam musarikara [1], tara nibrtta habe na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asabe [2]—
allahara kacha theke eka rasula, yini tela'oyata karena pabitra patrasamuha
yate ache sathika bidhibad'dha bidhana
Ara yaderake kitaba deya hayechila tara to bibhakta hala tadera kache suspasta pramana asara para
Ara taderake kebala e nirdesa'i pradana kara hayechila ye, tara yena allahara ibadata kare tamra'i jan'ya dinake ekanistha kare ebam salata kayema kare o yakata pradana kare. Ara eta'i sathika dina
Niscaya kitabidera madhye yara kuphari kareche tara ebam musarikara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe abasthana karabe; tara'i srstira adhama
Niscaya yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche, tara'i srstira sraestha

Tadera rabera kache ache tadera puraskara: Sthayi jannata, yara nice nadi prabahita, sekhane tara cirasthayi habe. Allah tadera prati santusta [1] ebam tara'o tamra prati sastusta. Eti tara jan'ya, ye tara rabake bhaya kare
Yakhana prabala kampane yamina prakampita kara habe
ara yamina tara bhara bera kare debe
ara manusa balabe, ‘era ki hala [1]?’
Sedina yamina tara brttanta barnana karabe
karana apanara raba take nirdesa diyechena
Sedina manusa bhinna bhinna dale bera habe [1], yate taderake tadera krtakarma dekhana yaya
ke'u anu parimana satkaja karale se ta dekhabe
Ara ke'u anu parimana asatkaja karale se ta'o dekhabe
Sapatha urdhbasbase dhabamana asbarajira
atahpara yara ksurera aghate agni-sphulinga bicchurita kare
atahpara yara abhiyana kare prabhatakale
phale tara ta dbara dhuli utksipta kare
atahpara ta dbara satru dalera abhyantare dhuke pare
Niscaya manusa tara rabera prati bara'i akrtajna
ara niscaya se e bisaye saksi
ara niscaya se dhana-sampadera asaktite prabala
Tabe ki se jane na yakhana kabare ya ache ta ut'thita habe
ara antare ya ache ta prakasa kara habe
niscaya tadera raba sedina tadera byapare sabisesa abahita
Bhitiprada maha bipada
bhitiprada maha bipada ki
ara bhitiprada maha bipada samparke apanake kise janabe
sedina manusa habe biksipta patangera mata
ara parbatasamuha habe dhunita rangina pasamera mata
Atahpara yara pallasamuha [1] bhari habe
se to thakabe santosajanaka jibane
Ara yara pallasamuha halka habe
tara sthana habe ‘ha'oyiyah’
Ara apanake kise janabe seta ki
atyanta uttapta aguna
Tomaderake mohacchanna rakhe [1] pracuryera pratiyogita
yataksana na tomara kabare upanita ha'o
Kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
tarapara, kakhano naya, tomara sighra'i janate parabe
kakhano naya! Yadi tomara niscita jnane jnani hate
abasya'i tomara jahannama dekhabe
tarapara abasya'i tomara ta dekhabe caksusa pratyaye
tarapara abasya'i sedina tomaderake neyamata samparke prasna kara habe
Samayera sapatha
niscaya manusa [1] ksatira majhe nipatita
Kintu tara naya [1], yara imana eneche [2] ebam satkaja kareche [3] ara parasparake upadesa diyeche hakera [4] ebam upadesa diyeche dhairyera
Durbhoga pratyekera, ye pichane o samane lokera ninda kare
ye sampada jamaya o ta bara bara ganana kare
se dharana kare ye, tara artha take amara kare rakhabe
kakhana'o na, se abasya'i niksipta habe [1] hutamaya
ara apanake kise janabe hutama ki
eta allahara prajbalita aguna
ya hrdayake graasa karabe
niscaya eta taderake paribestana kare rakhabe
dirghayita stambhasamuhe
Apani ki dekhena ni [1] apanara raba hatira adhipatidera prati ki karechilena
tini ki tadera kausala byarthataya paryabasita kare denani
ara [1] tadera birud'dhe tini jhamke jhamke pakhi pathana
yara tadera upara sakta poramatira kankara niksepa kare
Atahpara tini taderake bhaksita trna-sadrsa karena
Kura'ise[1]ra asaktira karane
tadera asakti ache sita o grisme sapharera
ata'eba, tara ‘ibadata karuka e gharera rabera
yini taderake ksudhaya khadya diyechena [1] ebam bhiti theke taderake nirapada karechena
Apani ki dekhechena [1] take, ye dinake [2] asbikara kare
se to se-i, ye iyatimake rurhabhabe tariye deya
ara se ud'dhud'dha kare na [1] misakinadera khadya dane
Kaje'i durbhoga se salata adayakaridera
yara tadera salata sambandhe udasina
yara loka dekhanora jan'ya ta kare
ebam ma‘una [1] pradana karate birata thake
Niscaya amara apanake ka'uchara [1] dana karechi
Kaje'i apani apanara rabera uddesye salata adaya karuna ebam kurabani karuna
Niscaya apanara prati bidbesa posanakari'i to nirbansa
Baluna, ‘he kaphirara
‘ami tara ‘ibadata kari na yara ‘ibadata tomara kara
Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari na'o yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
ebam ami ‘ibadatakari na'i tara yara ‘ibadata tomara kare asacha
Ebam tomara'o tamra ‘ibadatakari habe na yamra ‘ibadata ami kari
tomadera dina tomadera, ara amara dbina amara [1].’
Yakhana asabe allahara sahayya o bijaya
ara apani manusake dale dale allahara dine prabesa karate dekhabena
takhana apani apanara rabera prasansasaha tamra pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam tamra kache ksama prarthana karuna, niscaya tini ta'oba kabulakari
Dhbansa hoka abu lahabera [1] du‘hata [2] ebam dhbansa hayeche se nije'o
Tara dhana-sampada o tara uparjana [1] tara kono kaje ase ni
Acire se dagdha habe lelihana agune
ara tara stri'o [1]- ye indhana bahana kare
tara galaya [1] pakano rasi
Baluna [1], ‘tini allah, eka-adbitiya
‘allah hacchena ‘samada' [1] (tini karo mukhapeksi nana, sakale'i tamra mukhapeksi)
tini ka'uke'o janma denani ebam tamke'o janma deya hayani
‘ebam tamra samatulya ke'u'i ne'i [1].’
Baluna [1], ‘ami asraya prarthana karachi [2] usara rabera
tini ya srsti karechena tara anista hate
ara anista hate ratera andhakarera, yakhana ta gabhira haya
ara anista hate samasta naridera, yara giraya phumka deya
ara anista hate hinsukera [1], yakhana se hinsa kare [2].’
Baluna, ‘ami asraya prarthana karachi manusera rabera
manusera adhipatira
manusera ilahera kache
atmagopanakari kumantranadatara [1] anista hate
ye kumantrana deya manusera antare
jinera madhya theke ebam manusera madhya theke [1].’
